name: Take CHALLENGE with POTTERY class !!!
description:
Bát Tràng is a very famous pottery village in the north of Việt Nam. Bát (鉢) means bowl of monk, Tràng (場, or Trường) means "big yard" - land of specialists. Bát Tràng (鉢場) have other meaning: "Whenever you go, don't forget your origin".

Coming to Pottery class of Bát Tràng moment, you will learn how to make pottery by Vietnamese traditional way. Beside being fun, it is a way for you to come back your childhood. The  most funny things are the most simple things in your life.
